commit message: Add new icons for products and show them with lines.
Show the name of a line where the data has sufficient quality.
Turn off GPS when leaving map and turn it back on when user returns.

'Get Location from Map' now shows area of favourite locations or whole provider area.

If both are unavailable, the entire world will be shown like before.
release 1.1.2-alpha1
Fix problem where trip duration was sometimes cut off

Improve some existing provider logos

Closes #192
Add button to map that shows current position and follows it
Recognize when GPS loses the fix

Use new F-Droid badge

Closes #197

Redo many vector logos to avoid stupid crash

Fixes #194
If a trip comes without a path, draw the path ourselves on the map
Draw a Accuracy Circle also in red instead of blue.
show white home icon in home picker dialog when using dark theme

Means of Transport can now be selected with check boxes in a dialog.

Closes #106
update translations
release 1.1.2-beta1
update PTE
updated translations and added Tamil translation
release 1.1.2
